lead_paragraph: A spokeswoman for The Times said there was no evidence that any of the bureau’s internal systems were compromised in an attempted breach this month.

byline.original: By NICOLE PERLROTH and DAVID E. SANGER

headline.print_headline: Times’s Moscow Bureau Hit by Attempted Hacking
headline.main: New York Times’s Moscow Bureau Was Targeted by Hackers

snippet: A spokeswoman for The Times said there was no evidence that any of the bureau’s internal systems were compromised in an attempted breach this month....
abstract: New York Times's Moscow bureau is reported to be target of attempted cyberattack; no evidence exists that hackers, thought to be working for Russian intelligence, were successful.
